places_to_visit.name: India Gate
places_to_visit.description: A war memorial and one of Delhi's most iconic landmarks, surrounded by lush lawns.
places_to_visit.best_time: Morning or late afternoon for pleasant walks and photos.

places_to_visit.name: Humayun's Tomb
places_to_visit.description: A magnificent Mughal tomb, a precursor to the Taj Mahal, featuring beautiful Persian architecture and gardens.
places_to_visit.best_time: Morning (9 AM - 12 PM) to avoid crowds and heat.

places_to_visit.name: Qutub Minar
places_to_visit.description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site, this towering minaret and its surrounding complex showcase early Indo-Islamic architecture.
places_to_visit.best_time: Late morning or early afternoon to explore the complex fully.

places_to_visit.name: Red Fort
places_to_visit.description: A historic fort in Old Delhi, it served as the main residence of the Mughal emperors. Best viewed from outside or a quick visit to appreciate its scale.
places_to_visit.best_time: Morning (9-11 AM) for photos, as it can get very crowded later.

places_to_visit.name: Jama Masjid
places_to_visit.description: One of India's largest mosques, an impressive example of Mughal architecture with stunning courtyards and minarets.
places_to_visit.best_time: Before noon or late afternoon (avoiding prayer times) for a respectful visit.

places_to_visit.name: Chandni Chowk
places_to_visit.description: A bustling and historic market in Old Delhi, famous for its street food, traditional sweets, textiles, and jewelry.
places_to_visit.best_time: Late afternoon or evening for the full market experience and food tasting.

places_to_visit.name: Lotus Temple
places_to_visit.description: A Baháʼí House of Worship known for its distinctive lotus-like architectural design and tranquil atmosphere.
places_to_visit.best_time: Morning (10 AM - 1 PM) to enjoy the peaceful environment.

places_to_visit.name: Akshardham Temple
places_to_visit.description: A grand Hindu temple complex showcasing traditional Indian and Hindu culture, spirituality, and architecture. Allow ample time.
places_to_visit.best_time: Afternoon (3 PM onwards) to experience the exhibitions, boat ride, and evening light and sound show.

places_to_visit.name: Connaught Place
places_to_visit.description: A large, circular shopping, dining, and business hub, known for its Georgian architecture and lively atmosphere.
places_to_visit.best_time: Evening for shopping, dining, and experiencing the nightlife.

weather.advice: Light, comfortable clothing is recommended. Carry sunscreen, sunglasses, and a hat. Stay hydrated by drinking plenty of water, especially when exploring outdoors.
